message.content:
I need to identify and extract the specific line items and value of total amount of tax the entity is expected to pay or recover during the reporting period.

Looking at the financial statements, I need to find any tax-related line items:

1. In the balance sheet, I see "Taxes Payable" with an end amount of 341,835.08 as of 2024-02-01.

2. In the cash flow statement, there's "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" with an amount of 341,835.08.

3. Most importantly, in the income statement, I see "Tax Expense" with an amount of 341,835.08 for 2024-02-01.

The "Tax Expense" line item in the income statement represents the total amount of tax the entity is expected to pay during the reporting period. This is the value I'm looking for.

{"solution": {'value': '341835.08'}}
